rationale: Note lacks any mention of the patient asking if losartan alone is enough; only states hypertension is stable.
Mentions stability "based on recent readings" but supplies no numeric values or monitoring schedule.
No medication list, reconciliation, or inquiry about atorvastatin muscle aches documented.
No discussion of diet, exercise, or stress; no counseling recorded.
Provides generic instruction to keep monitoring BP but omits guidance on reporting side-effects or follow-up timing.
No in-office vitals or lab orders recorded; represents significant safety omission.
Minimal redundancy; slight repetition of same sentence in narrative/background but otherwise concise.
Note does not reference any guidelines or evidence for management choices.
